E00.label: Question
E00.description: Information-seeking or help-requesting tone. Esample: 'When does the reading room open?

E01.label: Comment or complaint
E01.description: User shares feedback, praise, or complaints without asking for action.

E02.label: Suggestion(s)
E02.description: User proposes improvements or next steps; may be phrased as a question. Example: 'Could you not expand the opening hours?

E03.label: Invective or harmful content
E03.description: Insults, threats, or hostile/abusive language toward anyone.
